Decent quality.  Main problem is the guy recording it left it on auto-focus, so every time the light level changes it goes out of focus for a while.  Annoying but you can live with it.  PROTIP GUYS:  Turn off auto-focus.  Once you set the focal distance to a static object, it doesn't change.

This upload is utter CRAP, even for a cam. As stated in earlier comments, ever heard of turning off "AUTO-FOCUS"... This is painful to watch... even the title "FOCUS Entertainment" is HORRIBLY OUT OF FOCUS. The audio sucks, even with EQ adjustment it echoes and the camera is tilted and pulled in throughout the movie. Not to mention the woman's head that appears at the bottom right of the screen intermittently throughout the entire movie. Couldn't you tell her you were trying to capture the film for some project and have her f'n MOVE! 
The movie sucks anyway and despite what critics say it's predictable and uninspiring to say the least. It looks like some wannabe director's first attempt at a feature film.

DON'T WASTE YOUR TIME ON THIS P.O.SHITE!!
